title: NLP for Other Languages with Machine Learning
description: Natural Language Processing (NLP) is a great task in Machine Learning to work with languages. However, you must have seen everyone working with only in the English language while working on a task of NLP. So what about other languages that we have. In this article, I will take you through NLP for other Languages with Machine Learning.Everyone knows India is a very diverse country and a hotbed of many languages, but did you know India speaks 780 languages. It’s time to move beyond English when it comes to NLP. This article is intended for those who know a little about NLP and want to start using NLP for other languages.Also, Read – Analyze Healthcare Data with Python.
